text: @realDonaldTrump U demon trouble maker all U want 2 do is continue 2 divide this country! There R millions out of work, thousands fighting COVID19 & thousands dead. U have said & done enough. Can’t U find something else 2 talk about? I guess not! U pea brain. U won’t B re-elected either.Go 2 hell
